ogTitle: quote of the day: michael jackson
ogDescription: anever forget where your talent came from, that your talent is a gift from god.a

card_1.cardText:
> _aNever forget where your talent came from, that your talent is a gift from God.a_

MICHAEL JACKSON

card_10.cardText:
Michael Jackson recalling what Ed Sullivan told him during their first meeting. On this day, in 1982, the "Thriller" album debuted - a worldwide sensation. Only in August this year, the Eaglesa Greatest Hits topped it as the best-selling album of all time.

[view sources](https://smarthernews.com/18-11-30-jackson-qtd/)
